page.title: 06DRURIDGE BAY MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: In the second year the teachers are:Mrs.O'Hara,Mr.White and Mrs. Arkle.In the third year the teachers are:Mr.Thomas,Mr.Etherington and Mrs.Wilkinson.In the forth year the teachers are :Mr.Elliot,Mr.Smith and Mr. Pirt.The other teachers are Miss Archibald,Mrs.Jones,Mr. Friberg and Mr.Surtees. Mrs.Redford is the school secretary and Mr.Little the headmaster. The curriculum is organised on the basis of sets according to pupil's abilities.This is to give every pupil the best chance of acheiving his or her full potential.
